data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Korba. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Korba, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Korba.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Korba, Chhattisgarh, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Korba, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Arakala people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Arakala people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Arakala people is yours.
Father, encourage the 13,273 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 13,273 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.section_summary:
the county of Korba, Chhattisgarh, India has a population of 1,206,600.

We estimate Korba has 13,273 people who might know Jesus, 14,640 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,178,687 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Korba, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

location.name: Korba
location.people_groups_list: Sapru, Anamuk, Rajna, Aray Mala, Lohar (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Sapru (1,100), Anamuk (400), Rajna (500), Aray Mala (4,200), Lohar (Hindu traditions) (9,443,000)
